title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.5 - Powers of the alj
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.5 - Powers of the alj

State Regulations

The ALJ shall have the power to: (a) preclude irrelevant or unduly
repetitious, tangential or speculative testimony or argument; (b) rule upon all requests; (c) administer oaths and
affirmations; (d) summon and
examine witnesses; and
(e) take any
measures necessary for maintaining order and the efficient conduct of the
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
674.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
